name: New Santos
description:
Description: A futuristic zombie platformer where you’re teleported into different rooms that you have to escape from without dying. You play as a girl who woke up after the zombie apocalypse in New Santos and is trying to escape. Your goal is to escape each room and either avoid the zombies, or kill them, but you have to get to the purple portal. Good luck! :)

Controls: Use A and D to move left and right, and spacebar to jump. Press W while next to a wall to climb up it. While in the air, press the left mouse button to dash. Experiment with this, as there are many different ways that you can dash.

Genre: zombie platformer
